name: weather_chat_orchestrator_agent
description: An orchestrator agent that handles natural language weather queries and intelligently routes requests to specialized weather agents. Provides conversational access to all 16+ weather, mapping, and data analysis tools.

skills.name: Natural Language Query
skills.description: Process natural language weather questions and route to appropriate specialized agents.

skills.name: Multi-turn Conversation
skills.description: Maintain context across multiple conversation turns for follow-up questions.

skills.name: Route to Alerts Agent
skills.description: Direct alert-related queries to the alerts snapshot workflow.

skills.name: Route to Forecast Agent
skills.description: Direct forecast queries to the weather forecast workflow.

skills.name: Route to Risk Analysis Agent
skills.description: Direct risk assessment queries to the risk analysis workflow.

skills.name: Route to Emergency Resources Agent
skills.description: Direct resource finding queries to the emergency resources workflow.

skills.name: Route to Hurricane Simulation Agent
skills.description: Direct hurricane analysis queries to the hurricane simulation agent.

skills.name: Synthesize Response
skills.description: Combine results from multiple agents into coherent conversational responses.
